title: Mental Health Medication
details: A board-certified doctor at PlushCare can work with you to diagnose and treat your mental health condition with medication.

title: Online Therapy
details: Our licensed therapists provide you with on-going emotional support and the opportunity to develop and grow. Our therapy program is for individuals over 18 years old.

title: Primary Care Physicians
details: Our primary care physicians look after your body and mind. Monitoring your mental health progress and taking care of your general health needs.

title: Dedicated talk therapists
details: Our therapists are highly trained to provide virtual support for individuals dealing with all types of conditions ranging from anxiety and depression to life transitions, stress, and loss.

title: Consistent care for lasting results
details: Meet with your dedicated online therapist for 45 minutes for $119/session and $20 discount for weekly sessions. You’ll also get access to our care team.

title: Comprehensive mental healthcare
details: Along with therapy, you’ll have access to our network of primary care physicians who can work with you to prescribe medication and other health services.
